channel.title: correctCoordinates() on login
channel.description:
When people dc in Duel arena they stay there when they log back in. I should add:
[CODE]if (inDuel()) { getPA().movePlayer(2657, 2639, 0); }[/CODE]
to the correctcoordinates method in Client.java. But when i login nothing is happening.
So i checked what my position are when i login: i add
[CODE]sendMessage(""+absX+" "+absY+"");[/CODE] at the end of my initialize method in client.java. When i start my client and login it says: -1 -1. What means that my position is loading after the initialize method.
How can i make sure that my position is loading directly after loging in, so my correctcoordinates is working.
Hopefully you understand what's wrong. PS i use PI

item.title: correctCoordinates() on login
item.dc:creator: @uranic uranic
item.description:
